Of course, now that everyone has access to a world-class virtual assistant, coming up with new ways to ask for things has become remarkably easy.

So, whether you’re trying to make reservations at a bustling restaurant or ask for a discount on a premium product, you can now ask your ai bot of choice to come up with the ‘best phrasing’ or ‘sample transcript’ for your future interaction.
While it won’t make it any less awkward to ask, by having a template to follow, it can help you carry yourself in way that makes it more likely that your request will be well received.
